name: Old bronze coin
description: An ancient coin with a Minotaur's head stamped on one side. Heads or tails if I get in trouble for taking this.

name: Intricate bowl
description: It's a small, engraved clay bowl painted with labyrinthine patterns.

name: An old shoe
description: If the shoe fits... I'd hope to find the other one to make a pair.

name: Skeletal remains
description: There's something eerily familiar about this old adventurer...

name: Plate
description: A beautifully preserved dinner plate, with a golden rim.

name: Jewel-encrusted spoon
description: A rather garish soup scooping implement. Not for use with everyday soups, of course.

name: Old silver coin
description: People say I have the gift of a silver tongue. I'd much prefer the gift of a silver coin!

name: Board game
description: Looks like it's for two players. I wonder if I could tempt the Minotaur to play a round...

name: Old gold coin
description: It's definitely not pyrite! I'd be a fool NOT to take it!

name: Royal mantle
description: A weighty mantle of silk and gold cloth.

name: Old platinum coin
description: An ancient platinum coin! Enough for a downpayment on that house I've been after!

name: Crown
description: A bejewelled headpiece fit for royalty!

name: Heart of the Minotaur
description: The fabled jewel of the Minotaur's labyrinth. Doom awaits whomsoever should claim it. On the other hand, so do fame and fortune so I'll take my chances!
